S4.T1.caption: Table 1: Comparison on the highest test accuracy for the four algorithm in the case of Î²=0.5ğ›½0.5\beta=0.5

\hhlineMethod SVHN CIFAR-10 CIFAR-100
FedGG 80.0%Â±0.2%plus-or-minuspercent80.0percent0.2\bm{80.0\%}\pm 0.2\% 71.1%Â±0.2%plus-or-minuspercent71.1percent0.2\bm{71.1\%}\pm 0.2\% 61.6%Â±0.1%plus-or-minuspercent61.6percent0.1\bm{61.6\%}\pm 0.1\%
FedAvg 79.6%Â±0.3%plus-or-minuspercent79.6percent0.379.6\%\pm 0.3\% 69.2%Â±0.4%plus-or-minuspercent69.2percent0.469.2\%\pm 0.4\% 60.1%Â±0.2%plus-or-minuspercent60.1percent0.260.1\%\pm 0.2\%
Fedprox 79.7%Â±0.4%plus-or-minuspercent79.7percent0.479.7\%\pm 0.4\% 69.0%Â±0.4%plus-or-minuspercent69.0percent0.469.0\%\pm 0.4\% 59.8%Â±0.2%plus-or-minuspercent59.8percent0.259.8\%\pm 0.2\%
Scaffold 78.2%Â±0.3%plus-or-minuspercent78.2percent0.378.2\%\pm 0.3\% 70.1%Â±0.3%plus-or-minuspercent70.1percent0.370.1\%\pm 0.3\% 61.0%Â±0.1%plus-or-minuspercent61.0percent0.161.0\%\pm 0.1\%
references: We evaluate the performance of the four algorithms on the three datasets with Î²=0.5ğ›½0.5\beta=0.5 and Î²=0.1ğ›½0.1\beta=0.1 and each algorithm is repeated by three times. For FedGG, we let the hyperparameters Î¼={001,0.01,0.1,1}ğœ‡0010.010.11\mu=\left\{001,0.01,0.1,1\right\} and show that it achieves the best performance in all three data sets with Î¼=0.01ğœ‡0.01\mu=0.01. For FedProx, we set its hyperparameter to be 0.01, which is the best hyperparameter mentioned in Ref.Â [15]. The highest tset accuracies of these algorithms over 100 communication rounds are given in TableÂ 1 and TableÂ 2.

From the results in TableÂ 1 and TableÂ 2, it can be concluded that FedGG achieves the highest test accuracy in all three data sets for both Î²=0.5ğ›½0.5\beta=0.5 and Î²=0.1ğ›½0.1\beta=0.1. Especially, in the extremely unbalanced case Î²=0.1ğ›½0.1\beta=0.1; i.e., the data distribution is closer to a practical situation, FedGG has a better performance, which is respectively 0.5%percent0.50.5\%, 2.2%percent2.22.2\% and 2.9%percent2.92.9\% higher than the second highest test accuracy in the three data sets. Furthermore, we notice that the performance of the same algorithm on the same data set degrades in the case of Î²=0.1ğ›½0.1\beta=0.1 compared to Î²=0.5ğ›½0.5\beta=0.5, since the model divergence is more critical between clients. By introducing the model-cosine loss, the local model update is guided by the direction of global model update, which alleviates this problem.

references: In order to show the high communication efficiency of FedGG, we take the algorithm test accuracy of FedAvg at the 100tâ€‹hsuperscript100ğ‘¡â„100^{th} communication round as a benchmark, and list the communication rounds required for the other algorithms to achieve this accuracy in TableÂ 3 and TableÂ 4 with Î²=0.5ğ›½0.5\beta=0.5 and Î²=0.1ğ›½0.1\beta=0.1, respectively.
